        <fields>{

                    "name":"full_name",

                    "options":["Select","Male","Female","Other"]
               },

                    "name":"ethnicity",
                    "type":"select",
                    "options":["Select","American Indian/Alaskan Native(Not Hispanic)","Asian(Not Hispanic)","Black/African American(Not Hispanic)","Hispanic/Latino","Native Hawaii/Pac Is(Not Hispanic)","Two or More Races(Not Hispanic)","White(Not Hispanic)"]
               },
                {
                    "label":"Height",
                    "name":"height",
                    "type":"text"
                   
               },
               {
                    "label":"Phone",
                    "name":"phone",
                    "type":"text"
               },
                {

                    "name":"repeat_offender",
                    "type":"select",
                     "options":["Select","Yes","No","Not Applicable"]
               }
                        
      ]
}

}</fields>
